channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Wide pothole on road between 22 and 21 Corpus Street, 9th January
item.description:
A wide pothole has appeared in the road between 22 and 21 Corpus Street and is slowly getting worse. Please could it be repaired.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 37, High Street, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole at end of Corpus Street (London Road end) by parking zone, 9th January
item.description:
The pothole was reported and allegedly fixed (FixMyStreet ref: 5198046) but has reappeared in an even worse state, deteriorating over the last few weeks. It's also in the parking zone bay meaning there are fewer places to park as the area can no longer be used due to the severity of the pothole.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 37, High Street, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Appalling potholed road surface - extended area, 9th January
item.description:
Appalling potholed and damaged road surface over an extended area along the busy Priors Road from Prestbury Road all the way along to the junction with Bouncers Lane. This surface has been awful for many months after being reported. Some half-hearted attempt was made to patch some of it up - but it's now worse than ever again.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 255, Priors Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain doesn’t ever empty and overflows after rain, 9th January
item.description:
Drain below bank at property Deepdale, Woolstone is blocked. Water streams down the road causing surface erosion after rain.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oxenton, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole in road which is constantly wet. Severn Trent have inspected several times and state it’s not a water leak. Road surface is breaking up., 9th January
item.description:
In the road outside number 12 Lynmouth Road. Problem has been there since August 2022 with multiple reports and inspections by several Trent. They maintain there is no leak even though the road is constantly wet.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lynmouth Road, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Grebe Gardens, Brockworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: The under road pipe is blocked, 9th January
item.description:
The under road pipe immediately to the west of White Cottage is blocked. This could cause flooding of our property if not dealt with quickly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gretton, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 9th January
item.description:
email rcvd 05.01.24 - A resident called to report this. Please tidy up and make any necessary remedial works to the tree. No need to report back to me. Branch fallen from tree on corner of Naunton Park Rd and Old Bath Rd, Cheltenham. Many thanks Sam Reader Assistant Trees Officer Cheltenham Borough Council
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sustained damage problem, 9th January
item.description:
damaged removed bollard. placed this behind the green tele comms box which is nearer the brockworth side. But on the bridge
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The sign is illegible problem, 9th January
item.description:
FMS fwd by CBC 05.01.24 - There are 3 Gloucestershire highways authority uneven road signs in Benhall Avenue . They have been there for months!
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot holes Wellington Lane, 9th January
item.description:
At the entrance to Wellington Lane there is a massive sunken area where it was repaired before. About 1.5m x 1m. Going further into Wellington Lane there are a number of pot holes that have caused damage to bicycle wheels and car tyre. Getting gvworse and not visible when full of water.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wellington Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A tree has fallen into Charlton Park Drive., 9th January
item.description:
Local residents have managed to cut the branches which were causing an obstruction to traffic but more needs to be done to enable traffic to park. It is located near the junction of Charlton Park Drive and Old Bath Road, opposite Reeves Field. We have checked and East Glos Tennis Club claim it is not on their land but on the grass verge.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Charlton Park Drive, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Tree causing damage/obstruction to pavement or road

item.title: Double manhole is loose and bangs as vehicles pass, 9th January
item.description:
On main road outside entrance to Arlington and other houses! Noise is increased from further traffic due to road closure 417 lorries at high speed at night and daytimes
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shurdington Road, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface problem, 9th January
item.description:
PERM Could you raise a perm repair enquiry for an inspector to visit defect location please. Made safe with M60 kerbing knocked out from seating, hole in the footway and the kerb stone in the side of the road (Enquiry 11447007)
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Speed sign facing wrong way, 9th January
item.description:
Noticed on Sunday 7th Jan, one of the speed signs has turned around where the road changes from 50 to 40 and vice a versa. Could cause people to think speed limit is more or less than it actually is.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Road, Elmstone Hardwicke, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
